llm_res.rule: allowance function should return the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.

Transfers _value amount of tokens to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend. Note Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event. function transfer(address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success)
